level.heading: Refuse compacting systems; multiple dwellings after May twentieth, nineteen hundred sixty-eight.
level.text: ยง 24-119 Refuse compacting systems; multiple dwellings after May twentieth, nineteen hundred sixty-eight. All multiple dwellings erected after May twentieth, nineteen hundred sixty-eight which are four or more stories in height and occupied by more than twelve families, or which are "class B" multiple dwellings as defined by the multiple dwelling law shall be provided with a refuse compacting system constructed, maintained and operated in conformity with all applicable laws and rules.
